title: Selling Fast! Kosciuszko National Park Chalet Escape with Daily Lift Pass, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description: Hurry, this ski offer is selling fast and rooms are extremely limited! Experience the thrill of Australia’s Snowy Mountains with a cosy ski-in, ski-out alpine escape at Kosciuszko Chalet Hotel. Perched high in snowbound Charlotte Pass - Australia’s oldest ski resort - this historic chalet is only accessible via included oversnow transfers, meaning no cars and fewer crowds. It’s the perfect base for mountain adventures, with snug rooms, an onsite bar for apres-ski drinks and Arches Restaurant, where a nightly three-course dinner awaits. The resort complex also offers a complimentary Kids Club to keep little ones entertained, and a warm, welcoming atmosphere for families or groups of friends.
offer_address: Charlotte Pass Oversnow, Kosciuszko Road, New South Wales 2624, Australia
